programme.title: Big Monster Wangmagwi
programme.desc: Aliens from another world that are seeking the conquest of Earth invade with flying saucers. They unleash a gigantic monster called Wangmagwi, which destroys everything in its path.

programme.title: Yokai Monsters: 100 Monsters
programme.desc: Vengeful creatures descend on arrogant nobles who have threatened to destroy the dwelling of some poor villagers.

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.desc: A compilation of snack-sized horror films to disturb genre fans across the world.

programme.title: Cop game
programme.desc: Two individuals go under cover to investigate a series of murders amid the Vietnam War's final days.

programme.title: Double Target
programme.desc: A former commando searching for his son in Vietnam is tasked with uncovering the people responsible for deadly attacks on American and British personnel throughout Southeast Asia.

programme.title: Strike Commando
programme.desc: An American soldier, betrayed by his superiors, is sent back to the jungle for a reconnaissance mission.

programme.title: Strike Commando 2
programme.desc: A commando rescues his squad leader from heroin smugglers in Burma.

programme.title: The Beast Must Die
programme.desc: A millionaire (Calvin Lockhart) plans to hunt whichever one of his guests turns into a werewolf under a full moon.

programme.title: The Rats Are Coming! The Werewolves Are Here!
programme.desc: Man-eating rodents are only playthings for a 19th-century family who have a unique problem with the full moon.
